TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Akihito, title = Akihito, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akihito} }

S.FORM: == Akihito == u siwkay niza 12 a bulad 23 a demiad, Akihito, u misingkiway. 1933 a mihcan nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Japan ayza sa ci Akihito, micakat a demiad sa i 1989 a mihcan 1 a bulad 7 a demiad. Akihito(1993.12.23 ) u saka125 a Hongtei nu Lipun. ayzaay a Hongtei. 1989.1.7 macakat, u ngangan nu Hongtei sa ci Pingchen. cyama niza sa ci Cawhe Hongtei. cina niza sa ci Singachun. u sakakaay a wawa ciniza. i zikuz nu sakatusa a palecawaw nu kitakit, inayi' tu tatengaay a kinli ku Lipun Hongtei. amiazih ku cudad atu misulit ngangan ciniza maka mangasiw 1000. mikileh maka 200 a labang atu saungay nu binawlan. maka 20 a salisin cacay a mihca. u ngangan niza u ngangan nu Hulam: 明仁天皇 u ngangan nu Lipun: 明仁 kakuniza nasulitan nu Hulam atu Amilika Akihito is the Emperor of Japan. He is the 125th Emperor of his line according to Japan's traditional order of succession. Akihito succeeded to the Chrysanthemum Throne upon his father Emperor Shōwa (Hirohito)'s death on 7 January 1989. Akihito is expected to abdicate in late March 2019.

== Akihito == o siwkay niza 12 a bolad 23 a demiad, Akihito, o misingkiway. 1933 a mihcan nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Japan ayza sa ci Akihito, micakat a demiad sa i 1989 a mihcan 1 a bolad 7 a demiad. Akihito(1993.12.23 ) o saka125 a Hongtei no Lipon. ayzaay a Hongtei. 1989.1.7 macakat, o ngangan no Hongtei sa ci Pingchen. cyama niza sa ci Cawhe Hongtei. cina niza sa ci Singachon. o sakakaay a wawa ciniza. i zikoz no sakatosa a palecawaw no kitakit, inayi' to tatengaay a kinli ko Lipon Hongtei. amiazih ko codad ato misolit ngangan ciniza maka mangasiw 1000. mikileh maka 200 a labang ato saongay no binawlan. maka 20 a salisin cacay a mihca. o ngangan niza o ngangan no Holam: 明仁天皇 o ngangan no Lipon: 明仁 kakoniza nasolitan no Holam ato Amilika Akihito is the Emperor of Japan. He is the 125th Emperor of his line according to Japan's traditional order of soccession. Akihito socceeded to the Chrysanthemom Throne opon his father Emperor Shōwa (Hirohito)'s death on 7 Janoary 1989. Akihito is expected to abdicate in late March 2019.
